verses.verse: Then I-yov <S%H347><s%> answered <S%H6030><s%> <S%H8799><s%> and said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%>,
How long will ye vex <S%H3013><s%> <S%H8686><s%> my soul <S%H5315><s%>, and break <S%H1792><s%> <S%H8762><s%> me in pieces with words <S%H4405><s%> ?

These ten <S%H6235><s%> times <S%H6471><s%> have ye reproached <S%H3637><s%> <S%H8686><s%> me: ye are not ashamed <S%H954><s%> <S%H8799><s%> that ye make yourselves strange <S%H1970><s%> <S%H8686><s%> to me.
And be it indeed <S%H551><s%> that I have erred <S%H7686><s%> <S%H8804><s%>, mine error <S%H4879><s%> remaineth <S%H3885><s%> <S%H8799><s%> with myself.
If indeed <S%H551><s%> ye will magnify <S%H1431><s%> <S%H8686><s%> yourselves against me, and plead <S%H3198><s%> <S%H8686><s%> against me my reproach <S%H2781><s%>:

Know <S%H3045><s%> <S%H8798><s%> now <S%H645><s%> that 'Elohim <S%H433><s%> hath overthrown <S%H5791><s%> <S%H8765><s%> me, and hath compassed <S%H5362><s%> <S%H8689><s%> me with his net <S%H4686><s%>.
Behold, I cry out <S%H6817><s%> <S%H8799><s%> of wrong <S%H2555><s%>, but I am not heard <S%H6030><s%> <S%H8735><s%>: I cry aloud <S%H7768><s%> <S%H8762><s%>, but there is no judgment <S%H4941><s%>.

He hath fenced up <S%H1443><s%> <S%H8804><s%> my way <S%H734><s%> that I cannot pass <S%H5674><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, and he hath set <S%H7760><s%> <S%H8799><s%> darkness <S%H2822><s%> in my paths <S%H5410><s%>.
He hath stripped <S%H6584><s%> <S%H8689><s%> me of my glory <S%H3519><s%>, and taken <S%H5493><s%> <S%H8686><s%> the crown <S%H5850><s%> from my head <S%H7218><s%>.

He hath destroyed <S%H5422><s%> <S%H8799><s%> me on every side <S%H5439><s%>, and I am gone <S%H3212><s%> <S%H8799><s%>: and mine hope <S%H8615><s%> hath he removed <S%H5265><s%> <S%H8686><s%> like a tree <S%H6086><s%>.
He hath also kindled <S%H2734><s%> <S%H8686><s%> his wrath <S%H639><s%> against me, and he counteth <S%H2803><s%> <S%H8799><s%> me unto him as one of his enemies <S%H6862><s%>.

His troops <S%H1416><s%> come <S%H935><s%> <S%H8799><s%> together <S%H3162><s%>, and raise up <S%H5549><s%> <S%H8799><s%> their way <S%H1870><s%> against me, and encamp <S%H2583><s%> <S%H8799><s%> round about <S%H5439><s%> my tabernacle <S%H168><s%>.
He hath put <S%H7368><s%> my brethren <S%H251><s%> far <S%H7368><s%> <S%H8689><s%> from me, and mine acquaintance <S%H3045><s%> <S%H8802><s%> are verily estranged <S%H2114><s%> <S%H8804><s%> from me.
My kinsfolk <S%H7138><s%> have failed <S%H2308><s%> <S%H8804><s%>, and my familiar friends <S%H3045><s%> <S%H8794><s%> have forgotten <S%H7911><s%> <S%H8804><s%> me.

They that dwell <S%H1481><s%> <S%H8802><s%> in mine house <S%H1004><s%>, and my maids <S%H519><s%>, count <S%H2803><s%> <S%H8799><s%> me for a stranger <S%H2114><s%> <S%H8801><s%>: I am an alien <S%H5237><s%> in their sight <S%H5869><s%>.

I called <S%H7121><s%> <S%H8804><s%> my servant <S%H5650><s%>, and he gave me no answer <S%H6030><s%> <S%H8799><s%>; I intreated <S%H2603><s%> <S%H8691><s%> him with <S%H1119><s%> my mouth <S%H6310><s%>.

My breath <S%H7307><s%> is strange <S%H2114><s%> <S%H8804><s%> to my wife <S%H802><s%>, though I intreated <S%H2589><s%> <S%H8800><s%> for the children's <S%H1121><s%> sake of mine own body <S%H990><s%>.
Yea, young children <S%H5759><s%> despised <S%H3988><s%> <S%H8804><s%> me; I arose <S%H6965><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, and they spake <S%H1696><s%> <S%H8762><s%> against me.
All my inward <S%H5475><s%> friends <S%H4962><s%> abhorred <S%H8581><s%> <S%H8765><s%> me: and they whom I loved <S%H157><s%> <S%H8804><s%> are turned <S%H2015><s%> <S%H8738><s%> against me.

My bone <S%H6106><s%> cleaveth <S%H1692><s%> <S%H8804><s%> to my skin <S%H5785><s%> and to my flesh <S%H1320><s%>, and I am escaped <S%H4422><s%> <S%H8691><s%> with the skin <S%H5785><s%> of my teeth <S%H8127><s%>.

Have pity <S%H2603><s%> <S%H8798><s%> upon me, have pity <S%H2603><s%> <S%H8798><s%> upon me, O ye my friends <S%H7453><s%>; for the hand <S%H3027><s%> of 'Elohim <S%H433><s%> hath touched <S%H5060><s%> <S%H8804><s%> me.
Why do ye persecute <S%H7291><s%> <S%H8799><s%> me as 'Elohim <S%H410><s%>, and are not satisfied <S%H7646><s%> <S%H8799><s%> with my flesh <S%H1320><s%> ?

Oh that <S%H5414><s%> <S%H8799><s%> my words <S%H4405><s%> were now <S%H645><s%> written <S%H3789><s%> <S%H8735><s%> ! oh that <S%H5414><s%> <S%H8799><s%> they were printed <S%H2710><s%> <S%H8714><s%> in a book <S%H5612><s%> !
That they were graven <S%H2672><s%> <S%H8735><s%> with an iron <S%H1270><s%> pen <S%H5842><s%> and lead <S%H5777><s%> in the rock <S%H6697><s%> for ever <S%H5703><s%> !

For I know <S%H3045><s%> <S%H8804><s%> that my redeemer <S%H1350><s%> <S%H8802><s%> liveth <S%H2416><s%>, and that he shall stand <S%H6965><s%> <S%H8799><s%> at the latter <S%H314><s%> day upon the earth <S%H6083><s%>:
And though after <S%H310><s%> my skin <S%H5785><s%> worms destroy <S%H5362><s%> <S%H8765><s%> this body, yet in my flesh <S%H1320><s%> shall I see <S%H2372><s%> <S%H8799><s%> 'Elohim <S%H433><s%>:

Whom I shall see <S%H2372><s%> <S%H8799><s%> for myself, and mine eyes <S%H5869><s%> shall behold <S%H7200><s%> <S%H8804><s%>, and not another <S%H2114><s%> <S%H8801><s%>; though my reins <S%H3629><s%> be consumed <S%H3615><s%> <S%H8804><s%> within <S%H2436><s%> me.
But ye should say <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, Why persecute <S%H7291><s%> <S%H8799><s%> we him, seeing the root <S%H8328><s%> of the matter <S%H1697><s%> is found <S%H4672><s%> <S%H8738><s%> in me?

Be ye afraid <S%H1481><s%> <S%H8798><s%> of the sword <S%H2719><s%>: for wrath <S%H2534><s%> bringeth the punishments <S%H5771><s%> of <S%H6440><s%> the sword <S%H2719><s%>, that ye may know <S%H3045><s%> <S%H8799><s%> there is a judgment <S%H1779><s%> <S%H8675><s%> <S%H1779><s%>.
